circle_info.about: The Knowledge Sharing Circle is a vibrant community dedicated to fostering learning, collaboration, and personal growth. We bring together passionate individuals to share knowledge, build skills, and create meaningful connections.
mission: Share expertise and learn from peers
Contribute to community growth and development
circle_info.vision: To be the leading platform for knowledge exchange and collaborative learning, empowering individuals to achieve their full potential while building a stronger, more connected community.

President.name: Sarah Johnson
President.role_description: Leading the circle's strategic vision and overall operations

Vice President.name: Michael Chen
Vice President.role_description: Supporting leadership and managing day-to-day activities

Treasurer.name: David Kim
Treasurer.role_description: Overseeing financial operations and budget management

Technical Lead.name: Alex Thompson
Technical Lead.role_description: Managing technical infrastructure and digital solutions

Events Coordinator.name: Lisa Wang
Events Coordinator.role_description: Planning and executing all circle events and activities
